get.description: Returns the list of support REST operations.
Returns the requested edge gateway.
Returns the list of all edge gateways at a certain location.

Returns a list of all edge gateway pool objects at a location.
Returns the requested fabric location.
Returns a list of all fabric locations.

put.description: Creates or updates a fabric location.  This will fail if called outside deployment.

get.description: Returns the requested fabric file share.
Returns a list of all fabric file shares at a certain location.
Returns the requested infrastructure role description.
Returns a list of all infrastructure roles at a location.

post.description: Power off an infrastructure role instance.
Power on an infrastructure role instance.
Shut down an infrastructure role instance.

get.description: Return the requested infrastructure role instance.
Returns a list of all infrastructure role instances at a location.
Return the requested IP pool.

put.description: Create an IP pool.  Once created an IP pool cannot be deleted.

get.description: Returns a list of all IP pools at a certain location.
Returns the requested logical network.
Returns a list of all logical networks at a location.
Return the requested a storage pool.
Returns a list of all storage pools for a location.
Return the requested storage subsystem.
Returns a list of all storage subsystems for a location.
Return the requested a storage volume.
Returns a list of all storage volumes at a location.
Returns the requested logical subnet.
Returns a list of all logical subnets.
Returns the requested MAC address pool.

Returns a list of all scale units at a location.

Returns a list of all scale unit nodes in a location.

Returns a list of all software load balancer instances at a location.

location.description: The region where the resource is located.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object. This name should match the name that appears in RBAC or the event service.

display.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation or action.

Display.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation / action..

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name  it is expected to also include the publisher/company responsible. It should use Title Casing and begin with "Microsoft" for 1st party services. e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute.".

resource.description: The localized, friendly version of the resource type related to this action or operation; the resource type should match the public documentation for the resource provider.

operation.description: The localized, friendly name for the operation. Use the name as it will be displayed to the user.

description.description: The localized, friendly description for the operation. The description will be displayed to the user. It should be thorough and concise for used in both tooltips and detailed views.

OperationList.description: A pageable list of supported operations objects.

EdgeGateway.description: This resource represents a gateway, which provides the configuration needed to provide gateway services to virtual networks.

properties.description: Object which holds information related to edge gateways.

EdgeGatewayModel.description: Object which holds information related to edge gateways.

state.description: The current state of the edge gateway.

EdgeGatewayPool.description: This object represents an edge gateway pool, which contains a list of gateways.

properties.description: The properties of an edge gateway pool.

EdgeGatewayPoolModel.description: An object that contains the properties of an edge gateway pool.

gatewayType.description: The gateway type, for example, S2sIPsec, S2sGre, and so on.

numberOfGateways.description: The number of gateways in the pool.

gatewayCapacityKiloBitsPerSecond.description: Gateway capacity in kilobits per second.

edgeGateways.description: List of the edge gateways in the pool.

EdgeGatewayPoolList.description: A pageable list of edge gateway pools objects.

value.description: List of edge gateway pool objects.

nextLink.description: The URI to the next page.

FileShare.description: Object that contains properties of the file share resource.

properties.description: Properties of a file share resource.

FileShareModel.description: Properties of a file share resource.

FileShareList.description: Pageable list of fabric file share locations.

displayName.description: Display name for the infrastructure role.

restartable.description: Value indicating whether the infrastructure role can be restarted.

InfraRoleInstance.description: The virtual machine resource is used to represent an infrastructure virtual machine in the Azure Stack environment. The fabric resource provider only surfaces infrastructure virtual machines. These machines are never created directly by the admin, but rather as a side effect of expanding admin services.

properties.description: All properties of an infrastructure role instance.

InfraRoleInstanceModel.description: All properties of an infrastructure role instance.

scaleUnit.description: The cluster that the virtual machine's host is part of.

scaleUnitNode.description: URI to the scale unit node.

state.description: The current state of the virtual machine.

InfraRoleInstanceSize.description: The capacity information for a virtual machine.

memoryGb.description: The amount of memory, in GB, currently assigned to the virtual machine.

cores.description: The number of cores assigned to the virtual machine.

InfraRoleInstanceList.description: Pageable list of infrastructure role instances.

IpPool.description: This resource defines the range of IP addresses from which addresses are  allocated for nodes within a subnet.

numberOfIpAddresses.description: The total number of IP addresses.

numberOfAllocatedIpAddresses.description: The number of currently allocated IP addresses.

numberOfIpAddressesInTransition.description: The current number of IP addresses in transition.

LogicalNetwork.description: This resource represents a logical partition of physical network that is dedicated for a particular purpose.  A logical network comprises a collection of logical subnets.

metadata.description: Metadata related to the logical network.

networkVirtualizationEnabled.description: Flag to indicate that the network virtualization is enabled on the logical network.

subnets.description: List of subnets belonging to the logical network.

LogicalNetworkList.description: A pageable list of logical networks.

StoragePool.description: Representation of a storage pool resource.

properties.description: All properties of a storage pool.

StoragePoolModel.description: All properties of a storage pool.

sizeGB.description: Amount of space in the storage pool in GB.

StorageSystem.description: Representation of a storage system resource.

properties.description: All properties of a storage system.

StorageSystemModel.description: All properties of a storage system.

remainingSizeGB.description: Amount of free space in GB.

sizeGB.description: Total amount of space in GB.

LogicalSubnet.description: This resource represents a logical subnet.  A logical subnet is made of a subnet-vlan pair.

ipPools.description: All IP pools which belong to this subnet.

isPublic.description: The visiblity status of the IP pool.  If is true the associated pools are public IP address pools.

metadata.description: Metadata related to the logical network.

MacAddressPool.description: This resource represents a MAC address pool.  The default MAC address pools are used if you set the MAC address type for a virtual machine to 'Static'.  If the virtual machine setting is 'Dynamic', the hypervisor assigns the MAC address.

properties.description: Properties of a MAC address pool.

MacAddressPoolModel.description: Properties of a MAC address pool.

metadata.description: Metadata related to the MAC pool.

MacAddressPoolList.description: A pageable list of MAC address pools.

ScaleUnitCapacity.description: The capacity information for a physical machine.

memoryGB.description: The memory for the physical machine.

cores.description: The number of CPU cores for the physical machine.

ScaleUnit.description: Represents a cluster. Generally, the cluster will be a collection of hosts backed by failover cluster manager.

logicalFaultDomain.description: Fault domain name of the cluster.

nodes.description: List of nodes in the server.

model.description: Model of the servers in the cluster.

isMultiNode.description: Denotes if more than one node in cluster.

ScaleUnitList.description: A pageable list of scale units.

ScaleOutScaleUnitParameters.description: Input data that allows for adding a scale unit node.

bmcIpv4Address.description: BMC address of the physical machine.

computerName.description: Computer name of the physical machine.

ScaleOutScaleUnitParametersList.description: A list of input data that allows for adding a set of scale unit nodes.

nodeList.description: List of nodes in the scale unit.

awaitStorageConvergence.description: Flag indicates if the operation should wait for storage to converge before returning.

BareMetalNodeDescription.description: Description of a bare metal node used for ScaleOut operation on a cluster.

bmcIpv4Address.description: BMC address of the physical machine.

serialNumber.description: Serial number of the physical machine.

biosVersion.description: Bios version of the physical machine.

macAddress.description: Name of the MAC address of the bare metal node.

ScaleUnitNode.description: The physical server in a cluster.

properties.description: Holds all properties related to a scale unit node.

ScaleUnitNodeModel.description: Holds all properties related to a scale unit node.

bmcAddress.description: BMC address of the physical machine.

scaleUnitName.description: Cluster name of the physical machine.

canPowerOff.description: Value indicating whether the node can be powered off.

serialNumber.description: Serial number of the physical machine.

biosVersion.description: BIOS version of the physical machine.

ScaleUnitNodeList.description: A pageable list of scale unit nodes.

nextLink.description: The URI to the next page.

SlbMuxInstance.description: This resource represents an SLB MUX (software load balancing multiplexer, which distributes the tenant and tenant customer network traffic).

SlbMuxInstanceList.description: A pageable list of SLB MUX instances.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ResourceGroupParameter.description: Resource group in which the resource provider has been registered.
ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName

EdgeGatewayPoolParameter.name: edgeGatewayPool
EdgeGatewayPoolParameter.description: Name of the edge gateway pool.

InfraRoleInstanceParameter.name: infraRoleInstance
InfraRoleInstanceParameter.description: Name of an infrastructure role instance.

StorageSubSystemParameter.name: storageSubSystem
StorageSubSystemParameter.description: Resource group in which the resource provider has been registered.

MACAddressPoolParameter.name: macAddressPool
MACAddressPoolParameter.description: Name of the MAC address pool.

ScaleOutScaleUnitParametersInBody.name: nodeList
ScaleOutScaleUnitParametersInBody.description: A list of input data that allows for adding a set of scale unit nodes.

ScaleUnitNodeParameter.name: scaleUnitNode
ScaleUnitNodeParameter.description: Name of the scale unit node.

SLBMuxInstanceParameter.name: slbMuxInstance
SLBMuxInstanceParameter.description: Name of a SLB MUX instance.

azure_auth.description: Authorization uses an Azure Active Directory OAuth2 flow.
